name: xhs_agent

scripts.bundle: npm run build && ncc build dist/index.js -o dist/bundle
scripts.package: npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle/index.js --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output ../desktop/src-tauri/binaries/xhs-agent-aarch64-apple-darwin

description: Xiaohongshu publish agent with CDP Stealth mode
